data.text: @captaindanuk You got it!
@LX787SToms Right on!
Which tail? Can you guess which aircraft these tails belong to? #AsianaAirlines #livery #airplanes #avgeek http://t.co/X79kmtFkeC
@Cool_Beans_26 Glad you enjoyed your flight with us! :) Hope to see you on board again soon!
@Rob_Coppinger Welcome aboard! Hope you enjoy your brief stay in Seoul and thanks for flying with us! :)
Wanna fly on the new #ASIANA380? Grab a seat at special internet fares. View them here: http://t.co/EqsrD4ks15
What was your favorite moment on an Asiana Airlines flight? Tell us! #tbt
RT @choilovereaper: OMG OMG OMG! @AsianaAirlines I've been waiting so long! THANK U FOR GREAT BUSINESS SEATS! 아시아나 사랑해요! ❤️✈️ #ASIANA380 ht…
First Suite on #ASIANA380. #FirstClass #asianaairlines http://t.co/i7Davg1mkZ
@Schnuckms Thank you for coming on board with us! :) Hope to see you again soon!
@ryanjhun Glad you came on board with us! :) Hope to have you again soon!
Thanks for coming on board! Hope you enjoyed the #B747! RT @SarieJBerrie: My ride from #Shangai to #Seoul! http://t.co/7md8ZAEAoA
@askdrgracelee @Stuart58143471 Honestly, thanks for the kind compliments! :) Hope you have a great rest of the week!
@IWouldDie4Brew Thanks for visiting our lounge! :) Hope you enjoyed yourself.
We think #NewYork and #Chicago are two of the best cities in the US for Fall season. Which city do you admire more? http://t.co/XsPZ2eqKpx
Here's a thorough review of the Business Smartium class on the #ASIANA380! http://t.co/n8b46w5K85 Thanks, "Avid Flyer"!
@darvhan Thanks! We try our very best! :)
@RayKiro @ShawnChittle @RunwayGirl @Rob_Coppinger Thanks so much for the kind compliments! It surely made our Monday morning.. :)
@ksappleseed1 Hello! Please see attached photo for list of movies in October. Thank you! http://t.co/Cb43kWH9lN
@WDMcKinley @logos5702 Maybe you should try Hongdae! It's thriving with hip shops and boutiques, and interesting Korean food!
RT @Stuart58143471: Great flight once again with @AsianaAirlines @Flyasiana @ukflyasiana OZ522 full but crew great! Next flight OZ601-SYD h…
@MelissaRamoso Hi Melissa. Our apologies for the inconvenience. Please visit link to report the damage on your bag: http://t.co/W1ttQ9LN6s
@logos5702 Hello Webster! That would depend -- do you like shopping, food, historic landmarks or hip college towns?
@r_ckyyy OZ201/202 is operated by the A380 while OZ203/204 is B777. Thank you!! :) Have a great weekend.
@r_ckyyy Apologies in advance as it's not up on our English website, but here's a list of Audio Programs by channel: http://t.co/WadlfeVYkX
#TGIF! Here's what's playing on the AVOD system on the US - Seoul routes in October. #inflight #ife #movies http://t.co/zDGpSgZ4vU
@InfinitelySY Hello Hollee~ Here's a list of our in-flight movies playing in October on Personal TVs. http://t.co/zsHmAc5ik0
So many OZ planes!! Where to go next? RT @azteca_cr05: http://t.co/RrSStp9Hsf #asianaairlines #A320 http://t.co/qB1slhBzZ6
Hope you enjoy your flight on the #ASIANA380! RT @CalvinsCrayon: Asiana A380, here I come! @ HKG Airport http://t.co/QcnFWWuVne
Beautiful shot of our #ASIANA380! RT @jonjws1 HL7626 #ASIANAAIRLINES A380 https://t.co/8yuXlxkYna
Are you racking in enough miles to get your priority tags? #AsianaClub #asianaairlines http://t.co/V09vHBsJIc
RT @Soros004: Compliments for land personnel and crew of @AsianaAirlines ICN [OZ102 Sep29 ICN NRT | 30K] http://t.co/is73QZ0lSg
@MKPARK97 Hope you enjoyed your stay at our lounge! :)
@chuaenlai @Flyasiana We apologize for any and all inconvenience. Please let us know how we might be able to help. Thank you!
@xiaohuairenjin Welcome aboard, Jinny! :)
RT @MEGAPLANE: HL7746 -8 Aug 2013- #asiana #asianaairlines #airplane #aircraft #airlines #airways #airbus #airbuslovers #a330 #a... http://…
@Bobster031 Great! Hope to see you on board when you fly to HKG in 2015!
@vanes_sa2325 Aww... well there are still 3 months left of this year. Hope your wishes come true! :)
@laeddhi Awesome! Hope to see you again in the next year~ (or sooner!)
Win a pair of tickets to see #Popera #Tenor Lim Hyung Joo at the LA #Orpheum Theatre on Sept. 27th! RT & mention us~ http://t.co/1Zt5qWwho8
What cities were on your travel bucket list for 2014? Have you fulfilled them all yet? #Travel #TravelThursday #TravelTalk
@MartinChiffers @Flyasiana Sounds like you're on a wonderful journey with us! Welcome aboard~! :)
View from underneath the wings of our #B777! #travel #travelthursday http://t.co/aQ7quMQ34T
@wilfundal Sorry to hear that. You may try calling right now for assistance.
@wilfundal Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact our PSC directly at (213)365-4543 before 5:30pm PDT for immediate assistance.
Flying #FirstClass to ICN? Contact our Reservation Center for info on how to get #Chauffeur Service in Seoul! http://t.co/yIHr4ZJCzK
Are you an Asiana #planespotter? Tweet us your photos so we can share them on our #Pinterest board: http://t.co/3mVeLjH32H
This is the lower (main) deck! 311 Econ. seats in main deck, and 106 in the upper! Seat map: http://t.co/WzTvdee63c http://t.co/Cy6wUsSRAy
@ThomasDKMadsen Our pleasure! Here's our seatmap: http://t.co/WzTvdee63c
@ThomasDKMadsen Hi Thomas! Our Economy Class is spread out on both decks on the #ASIANA380.
Economy Class ("Travel Class") on the #ASIANA380. Can you guess if this is upper deck or lower deck? http://t.co/oL1wH1z5f1
@jodikittle Please keep in mind that the Internet Help desk opens at 8am Korea Time, so you might have to wait a few hours.
@jodikittle There is a separate Internet Desk that should be able to assist you with your ticket purchase.
@jodikittle Hello Jodi, looks like there could be several reasons on the difficulty. You may contact 1588-8000 within Korea.
Welcome to the First Class Lounge at #ICN Airport in #Seoul, #Korea! #AsianaAirlines #FirstClass #Lounge http://t.co/rVyY2ssZEc
@planeporns Beautiful! :) Thanks for the shot.
@SoManyYesPLs @choilovereaper This is the Business Smartium class on the #ASIANA380!
@IsangEnders @kumhoarthall Love this photo! :) Hope you enjoy your stay in Seoul~
RT @choilovereaper: Omg excited to be flying THIS when I go to Korea this year! 😍✈ @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/yC59Bu464H
@The_Woch_Man Hi David. Sorry to have disappointed. Please feel free to write to us here: http://t.co/QBo48a9Pyi to help us improve. Thanks!
@TheOnyxTavern Hi Rickey. You may contact 800-227-4262 in the US. Thank you!
@jodikittle Hello Jodi. Please let us know how we can help. Thank you!
@QS_Thomas Hello Thomas. Apologies for any & all inconvenience. You may submit your complaint here: http://t.co/QBo48a9Pyi
#ASIANA380, at your service! #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/d6g2zjNG0j
@BedfordBootBoy Welcome aboard! Hope you enjoy your flight with us. :)

Suite life! RT "@KosmoFlyer Caviar & First Class are the perfect match.
 First Suite ICN - JFK http://t.co/sZCCRZvobY" #FirstSuite #travel
@DshayOsby @AirbusA380__ Hello! Thanks for the kind compliments. Hope you have a great week, and hope to see you on board again soon!
@HannaHerbertson Awesome! Thanks for coming on board with us. Hope to see you again soon!
@asamae2kn Thanks for the photo! We pinned it on our  Pinterest page here: http://t.co/uotRdMwFjM
Flying with Asiana Airlines soon? Check departure schedule before you go for any possible changes: http://t.co/M5F9RAUewJ
Relax, it's the weekend! Bottoms up! #ASIANA380 #FirstSuite (Photo by @mc36ruz) http://t.co/v1qCicLyh2
@TheMakkiavelli We miss you too. Looking forward to have you on board -- hopefully soon!
#TGIF! The weekend is at the tip of our hands. Do you have any travel plans for the weekend? http://t.co/168YLqlgq8
@luisricardo28 Great to hear that things are getting resolved. Cheers!
@luisricardo28 The PSC desk will be available until 5:30pm PDT. Thank you!
@luisricardo28 Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact 213-365-4543 for immediate service. Thank you!
Who misses the #B747 from #LAX? Here's an oldie, but goodie! #TBT http://t.co/MR0JrNlXMp
@NecessaryIndulg mMmm. Delicious! Bacon, that is!
@UnitedFlyerHD This must be taken a while ago. The Queen has moved on from LAX! Thanks for sharing this photo~
@jarsteen_ Welcome to Asiana Airlines~
@skystub Thanks for sharing our video! :)
What's next on your trip to Korea? Try #KPerformance, the dynamic culture of Korea through traditional music &dance! http://t.co/uAIlrMPVH2
Staying at a Hilton Hotel? Be sure to earn up to 3x Asiana Club miles with every Hilton stay! More info: http://t.co/H0cVdqWtSa
@silouanthompson Wonderful! Thank you for the kind compliments. Hope you have a great rest of the week!
@Rob_Coppinger Welcome aboard, Robert! Can't wait to have you on board.
@TeplisOPS Sure. Please DM us info. Thank you!
Hey #KPOP fans! Wanna go to the 2014 #ICN Airport Sky Festival on Sept. 27th? Click for info: http://t.co/kYPq6ry0M7 http://t.co/OtkcRfUD85
@GlobalTravelCpl Have a great trip! :)
@gwlaglou Thanks for the kind compliments! Glad to have had you on board!  Hope to see you again soon!
Wow what a shot! RT "@markjohnson319 #AsianaAirlines A380 landing @flylaxairport from Seoul, South Korea https://t.co/MhWSYQ35FH" #ASIANA380
Happy Chuseok! Chuseok is Korean Thanksgiving, a day when families visit their ancestors & family and feast together! http://t.co/j91ytOt2Ca
@somaprecision Right on! But do you know the Korean word for it?
@bigmalx Correct, but do you know the Korean word for it? :)
Monday, September 8th is a very special #holiday in #Korea. Can you guess what holiday it is?
This is one of our favorite fan photos yet! RT @theamzgjetjones: my lil jetsetter waiting for his flight to #nagoya http://t.co/yhrxZUfFF9
Asiana Airlines A321 arriving at NGO in late afternoon.  Photo Courtesy of JangSu Aviation Photograp http://t.co/CCfNRb8x3Q
Do you have shots of our #aircraft? Be sure to Tweet them to us! We're posting on our #Pinterest board, "Fan Photos": http://t.co/k5Z63n9Wjb
Take advantage of exclusive examination rates at Asan Medical Center in Korea -only for Asiana passengers! http://t.co/fiPxJs1931
Thanks for the snapshot! RT "@yunryan @AsianaAirlines at the next gate... (#awesome ) http://t.co/EjzlG8WtCh"
